transcript:
Customer: Mujhe ye bataoge na ye problem
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji Tausif sir bol rahe the?
Customer: Ha ji good evening ji.
Executive: Tausif baat kar rahe hain Faridabad walon se?
Customer: Ha ji Tausif ji boliye.
Customer: Are sir kya ho gaya sir aap same cheez ke liye baar baar concern raise kar rahe hain sir.
Executive: To sir problem solve nahi hoga to kya karenge bataiye aap mujhe.
Customer: Kaise resolution kar doon kya ek baar finally?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Kaise resolution kar doon kya cancel hi kar doon kya sir bhi agar agar ye problem aap logo ko lag raha hai ki jo main concern raise kar raha hoon ye problem hai to call mat karo na mujhe mere bhai. Jab aapko lag raha hai jo problem create kar raha hoon aap call nahi resolution to sir har baar hum aapko resolution to sir hum har baar provide kar rahe hain aapko. Mere se sirf baat karke aap phone rakh do ye koi solution kuch hota hai?
Executive: Sir aapko proper resolution provide karke aapko virtual meeting karke sari guidance di ja rahi hai sari cheeze. Aap ye aapki nazar mein solution ho sakta hai aur aapke liye answer karne ke liye. Ha batao sir kya kiya jaye kya kiya jaye ki aap aap satisfy doge kya solution aapne commit kya kiya tha paise ke liye service ke time pe. Sir aapko ye MDC MDC se bahut better rahega MDC se ye MDC to bahut services hai hamari sir.
Customer: Ye dekho. Yaha pe ye problem aa rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai ye dekho.
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Ji ji ji kya kya aap kya keh rahe hain sir abhi kya problem aa rahi hai ab kya problem aa rahi hai abhi aapko?
Customer: Problem to likh ke bhej diya check karo na aap. Khud hi maloom ho jayega.
Executive: Sir aapne likha hai ki aapka paisa wapas kar do aapne ye likh ke bheja hai. To agar aapko apna paisa wapas karna hai to deactivation aapka process karwa de. Ji ji.
Customer: Ha kar dijiye sir.
Executive: Theek hai to services ka deactivation chahte hain aap na?
Customer: Ha services ka deactivation aap chaho to kar do chahe services mein aap services kar do aap. Nahi MDC sir wo to fir aise nahi hota hai matlab puri deactivate hoti hai sir services ek sath hoti hai to. Matlab aisa nahi hai ki aap services de rahe hain.
Executive: Waise MDC use kar MDC theek hai na mere ko?
Customer: Nahi to fir sir wo puri matlab abhi jo current services to aap upgrade karke usko TrustSeal pe le aaye hain na sir. To wo hum deactivate puri deactivate hoti hai puri profile hai na sir aapki. To wo puri deactivate hoti hai sir.
Customer: Sir theek hai sir mera pura paisa wapas hoga na fir to.
Executive: Ji sir?
Customer: To fir pura paisa wapas hoga na?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir jitni services aapne use kar li hai utni services use karne ke baad se jitne time ka paisa bacha hai. Jab aap log service de nahi sakte to fir kyun ye sab matlab ki karte ho aap log mujhe bas itna batao aap. Mujhe ek baat batao.
Executive: Sir kya aapki sir aap dekho aap MDC mein bhi jab the to aapne paanch se cheh baar concern raise kar diya tha ab aap ye keh rahe ho ki MDC achcha hai TrustSeal bekar hai. Aap khud aap mujhe suno pehle sir main to samajh gaya mere kehne ka matlab itna hai jo cheez aap log ke paas hai ya nahi hai mujhe nahi pata theek hai wo service humne jab aapko aap se liya wo cheez milna chahiye ki nahi milna chahiye batao mujhe.
Customer: Bilkul milna chahiye hum services aapko de rahe hain aapko leads de rahe hain aapko direct inquiries de rahe hain ab aap batao isme hum kya kar sakte hain. Nahi nahi aa raha hai aap check mera account check karo nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir abhi main aapke buylead ke section mein buylead ke section ki agar aap main baat bataun to abhi aapne jo last kari hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing ongoing issues.

- Wants a refund for the services.

- Believes MDC is better than TrustSeal.



Resolution:

- Executive offered deactivation of services.

- Explained MDC deactivation process.

- Clarified refund amount based on service usage.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to deactivate the services.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, deactivation, trustseal, mdc
